Method Detail

init

public void init(SessionProperties params)
Initializes the session using the parameters given in the XML configuration. Possible parameters:
  • suspect_sweep duration of a round in milliseconds.
  • suspect_time time to suspect a member, in milliseconds. This value is converted in number of rounds and added 1 (because rounds may not be synchronized)

Specified by:
init in interface InitializableSession
Parameters:
params - The parameters given in the XML configuration.
See Also:
InitializableSession.init(SessionProperties)

setParameter

public void setParameter(java.lang.String parameter,
                         java.lang.Long value)
                  throws AppiaManagementException
Change a parameter of a session. Possible parameters:
  • suspect_sweep duration of a round in milliseconds.
  • suspect_time time to suspect a member, in milliseconds. This value is converted in number of rounds and added 1 (because rounds may not be synchronized)

Throws:
AppiaManagementException
See Also:
net.sf.appia.management.ManagedSession#setParameter(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
